name: Sidelines: Before You Went In The Streets
name_original: Sidelines: Before You Went In The Streets
description: Welcome to Sidelines BYWITS! In this game, you will control traffic. Make sure you do it right! You don't want to mess up. Stay focused and don't leave the game unpaused when doing something else. Coming soon. Also refunds may be given. Idk how this payment thing works.
